verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ho, my comrades, see the signal, waving in the sky! Reinforcements now appearing, victory is nigh.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: “Hold the fort, for I am coming,” Jesus signals still; Wave the answer back to Heaven, “By Thy grace we will.”

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: See the mighty host advancing, Satan leading on; Mighty ones around us falling, courage almost gone!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: See the glorious banner waving! Hear the trumpet blow! In our Leader’s Name we triumph over every foe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fierce and long the battle rages, but our help is near; Onward comes our great Commander, cheer, my comrades, cheer!
